biotools.summary: Bayesian estimation of genomic clines to quantify introgression at many loci. Models are available for linked loci, genotype uncertainty and sequence errors. Models for genotype uncertainty and sequence error can be used to estimate genomic cline parameters from next-generation sequence data.
